heading: HR02453
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN CONDEMNING THE SENSELESS BOMBING AT THE OUR LADY OF MOUNT CARMEL CATHEDRAL IN JOLO, SULU, EXTENDING ITS PROFOUND SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE HAPLESS VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INVESTIGATION, AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS OF THE DASTARDLY ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-01-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02453
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN CONDEMNING THE SENSELESS BOMBING AT THE OUR LADY OF MOUNT CARMEL CATHEDRAL IN JOLO, SULU, EXTENDING ITS PROFOUND SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE HAPLESS VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INVESTIGATION, AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS OF THE DASTARDLY ACT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, SHERNEE ABUBAKAR
DATE FILED : 2019-01-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2019-01-30
